metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, delete content workflows and set the default workflow for new content items.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View list of all workflows with usage status

steps.action: Navigate to Settings > Workflow
steps.expected: Workflow list page displays with all workflows
steps.actual: Workflow list displayed showing all workflows with WORKFLOW TYPE, IN USE, ACTIONS, and DEFAULT columns

steps.action: Verify IN USE status is displayed
steps.expected: Workflows in use should show checkmark in IN USE column
steps.actual: Direct Publish and Content Approval showed checkmarks in IN USE column indicating they are being used

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create new workflow with unique name

steps.action: Click 'Create New Workflow' button
steps.actual: Form appeared with Workflow Name and Description fields

steps.action: Enter unique workflow name 'Automated Test Workflow 2026' and description
steps.actual: Fields accepted input correctly

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Workflow is created and appears in the list
steps.actual: Workflow was created successfully and appeared in the workflow list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create workflow with duplicate name - verify error

steps.action: Click 'Create New Workflow' button
steps.actual: Form appeared with Workflow Name and Description fields

steps.action: Enter duplicate name 'Direct Publish' (existing workflow name)
steps.actual: Field accepted input

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.expected: Error message displayed indicating duplicate name
steps.actual: Error message displayed: 'A workflow with this name already exists.'

steps.action: Click on 'Test Approval Workflow' to expand it
steps.expected: Workflow details expand showing edit form
steps.actual: Workflow expanded showing name, description, and workflow states

steps.action: Modify description field to 'Test workflow for approval process - edited during testing'
steps.actual: Field accepted new text

steps.action: Click Save button
steps.actual: Changes saved successfully, workflow collapsed

steps.action: Click on workflow again to verify changes
steps.actual: Description shows 'Test workflow for approval process - edited during testing'

steps.action: Create a workflow 'Workflow To Delete' for deletion testing
steps.actual: Workflow 'Workflow To Delete' was created successfully

steps.action: Hover over 'Workflow To Delete' to reveal delete button
steps.actual: Delete button appeared on hover

steps.action: Click delete button
steps.actual: Confirmation dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to delete the Workflow To Delete Workflow?'

steps.action: Click 'Yes' to confirm deletion
steps.expected: Workflow is deleted and removed from list
steps.actual: Workflow was deleted successfully, success message 'Workflow deleted' displayed, workflow removed from list

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Attempt to delete workflow in use - verify error

steps.action: Hover over 'Direct Publish' workflow which is in use
steps.actual: Only Edit (E) icon appeared, no Delete (D) icon shown

steps.action: Verify delete button is not available
steps.expected: Delete button should be hidden or disabled for in-use workflows
steps.actual: Delete button is hidden for workflows that are in use. The system prevents deletion at UI level.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Set workflow as default for new pages

steps.action: View workflow list with DEFAULT column
steps.expected: DEFAULT column shows radio buttons for each workflow
steps.actual: DEFAULT column displayed with radio buttons, 'Content Approval' was initially selected as default

steps.action: Click radio button for 'Test Approval Workflow'
steps.expected: Test Approval Workflow becomes the new default
steps.actual: Radio button selection changed to 'Test Approval Workflow', shown with filled blue circle

steps.action: Navigate away from Workflow page to Dashboard
steps.actual: Navigated to Dashboard successfully

steps.action: Navigate back to Settings > Workflow
steps.actual: Workflow page loaded successfully

steps.action: Verify 'Test Approval Workflow' is still the default
steps.expected: Test Approval Workflow shows filled radio button in DEFAULT column
steps.actual: Test Approval Workflow still has filled blue radio button in DEFAULT column. Also now shows checkmark in IN USE column because it's the default.

steps.action: Verify existing workflow with special characters
steps.expected: Workflow with special characters exists and displays correctly
steps.actual: Workflow 'Test <Special> & "Chars"' exists in the list and displays special characters correctly without XSS issues

observations: The workflow list displays IN USE status with checkmarks for workflows currently being used by content items
Delete button is hidden at UI level for workflows that are in use, preventing accidental deletion of active workflows
The system validates duplicate workflow names and shows a clear error message 'A workflow with this name already exists'
Default workflow selection persists across page navigation and is stored in the system
When a workflow is set as default, it automatically gets marked as 'in use' with a checkmark
Special characters (<, >, &, ") in workflow names are handled correctly without XSS vulnerabilities
Workflows with states in use have 'Add a State' button disabled to protect workflow integrity
The View Usage link allows administrators to see which content items are using each workflow
